mapper.select: SELECT t.TARGET_IDX AS idx, t.TARGET_NAME AS name, t.ICON_KEY AS iconKey, NVL(i.ICON, 'default-icon') AS icon, NVL(i.COLOR, '#999999') AS color FROM TARGET_CATEGORY t LEFT JOIN ICON_TABLE i ON t.ICON_KEY = i.ICON_KEY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TARGET_CATEGORY (TARGET_IDX, TARGET_NAME, ICON_KEY) VALUES (TARGET_CATEGORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{iconKey})
mapper.update:
UPDATE target_category
target_name = #{name},
icon_key = #{iconKey},
WHERE target_idx = #{idx}
